titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of April 13, 2009, through April 17, 2009, as "Protect Your Pharmacy Week", and for other purposes.
Expressing support for designation of the week of April 13, 2009, through April 17, 2009, as "Protect Your Pharmacy Week", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of Protect Your Pharmacy Week.
Encourages pharmacies to take steps to reduce their vulnerability to theft.
